A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was quite the interesting Star Wars release. Either you are going to love it or you are going to hate it! They have a director who has never done a Star Wars movie before and he just shook things up tremendously. I have to admit that we Star Wars fans are definitely stuck in our ways and want things to be a certain way. But he swooped in and just showed us some stuff we have never seen before. I was mad after watching it the first time. But when I watched it the second time and started reading all the fan comments and checking out all the theories\, I really grew to like this movie. The throne room fight scene was just breathtaking. I also enjoyed the final fight as well on the snow planet. There were some new Jedi tricks we have never seen before!
